localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: dLinks lets you build a decentralized profile on Web 3.0 in seconds. Built using Handshake and Sia: Handshake names are decentralized domains that no one can block access to. Skynet offers decentralized backend hosting that cannot be taken down.
blogPost.body: dLinks lets you build a decentralized profile on Web 3.0 in seconds. Built using Handshake and Sia: Handshake names are decentralized domains that no one can block access to. Skynet offers decentralized backend hosting that cannot be taken down.
blogPost.title: dLinks - An easy to use, no-code site builder for Web 3.0
blogPost.author: Neeraj Thakur

localize.description: dLinks允许您在几秒钟内在Web 3.0上构建分散配置文件。使用握手和SIA：握手名称是分散的域，任何人都不能通过挡路访问。天网提供无法关闭的分散式后端托管。
localize.tagline: 一个易于使用的、无代码的Web3.0站点生成器

localize.description: dLinks允許您在幾秒鐘內在Web 3.0上構建分散配置文件。使用握手和SIA：握手名稱是分散的域，任何人都不能通過擋路訪問。天網提供無法關閉的分散式後端託管。
localize.tagline: 一個易於使用的、無代碼的Web3.0站點生成器

previous.excerpt: An interactive space that shows how product management best practices work, including working examples of OKRs, outcome-based roadmaps, along with real examples of ideas, experiments, and customer feedback. Add, delete, and move items around as if you were using the tool to manage your own products.
previous.title: ProdPad Sandbox - Explore product mgmt best practices in an interactive space!

localize.description: 一个展示产品管理最佳实践如何运作的互动空间，包括OKR的工作实例、基于结果的路线图，以及想法、实验和客户反馈的真实案例。添加、删除和移动项目，就像你在使用该工具管理自己的产品一样。
localize.tagline: 在互动空间中探索产品管理的最佳实践!

localize.description: 一個展示產品管理最佳實踐如何運作的互動空間，包括OKR的工作實例、基於結果的路線圖，以及想法、實驗和客戶反饋的真實案例。添加、刪除和移動項目，就像你在使用該工具管理自己的產品一樣。
localize.tagline: 在互動空間中探索產品管理的最佳實踐!

next.excerpt: Logica helps finance teams with forecasting. Save time by building a financial model visually and connect tools like QuickBooks and ProfitWell to compare plan vs. actual.
next.title: Logica - Build a financial model in a drag-and-drop canvas

localize.description: Logica帮助财务团队进行预测。通过可视化地建立财务模型并连接QuickBooks和ProfitWell等工具来比较计划与实际情况，从而节省时间。
localize.tagline: 在拖放画布中建立一个财务模型。

localize.description: Logica幫助財務團隊進行預測。通過可視化地建立財務模型並連接QuickBooks和ProfitWell等工具來比較計劃與實際情況，從而節省時間。
localize.tagline: 在拖放畫布中建立一個財務模型。
